tags: None
review: Very good, humble, *** ************* general physician who took time to properly check the patient, addressed any concerns, explained properly. Would recommend, especially for senior citizens.  Thanks dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Pratima's patience, active listening, note taking and apt diagnosis are extremely commendable. She not only diagnoses accurately but also understands the psyche of the patient and counsels them accordingly. 90 percent of your fears are put to rest just by her calm listening and response . Her case history taking is so scientific and unique with such a beautiful handwriting  that you feel she is genuinely interested in seeing you in good health. Her treatment plant is extremely systematic and crystal clear. I have gotten treatment from her for my MIL, my aunt and myself and all we women have been extremely satisfied with her treatment for vertigo, high cholesterol, neck pain, weight management, high cholesterol management, heart disease, diabetes management, menopause, orthopenia and general overall health. She has become our go to doctor for everything and as a family we highly recommend her for apt diagnosis and systematic treatment plan!!! 10 ‚≠ê doctor!!! Thank you Dr. Pratima.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Madam was very friendly. She heard from the me very patiently and asked for every minute details.  She passified myaske all fears on medicine with good humour.  Followed up consultation sending additional informations on WhatsApp. She possesses a very pleasing personality and understands patient's psychology very well.\nAs an example of her good sense of humour l narrate the following. \n When l asked her whether l will be addicted to this medicine, she replied with a smile, \" Why, is it alcohol ? And even it is so somebody else would be addicted not you.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited recently Dr. Prathima for my recurring throat infection issue and she listened patiently not only for my throat infection issue but enquired about my other health issues as well and made detail notes. Post getting the history, she examined relevant vitals thoroughly and helped me understand about wet cough, dry cough and allergic cough.  This took almost one hour (no, this is not typo). Even post coming from clinic, she replied all my queries / concerns on whatsapp promptly and helped me recovering fast.  I found, there are very few doctors who are really concerned about patient health even post consultancy and Dr. Prathima is one of them.  I will highly recommend her for your health issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited in Oct 2019 to consult about cough and nasal congestion.She patiently listened to all the issues and explained in detail for about 30 mins(yes,you read it right) about the problems and the medication/lifestyle changes needed for cure.Not only did she suggest medicine, proactively she shared diet plan and followed up on her own to check the progress.Doctors like her are so rare these days.Even after 2 years,I feel she's possibly the most caring doctor I have ever consulted with.It was such and overwhelming experience.My üôè best wishes for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have visited the doctor along with my brother in law who is suffering from general health issues and back pain. With this experience, I would strongly recommend Dr. Prathima gaaru as a general physician to everyone. I have seen very less people with such a high levels of patience. She has listened to every single detail and showed interest in asking questions about all the related health issues. So knowledgeable and experienced doctor, my brother in law was completely happy with her treatment.

P.S There will be a little longer wait time but believe me, it is worth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is a very good doctor, who takes care of patient very professionally. I went for my wife's muscle spasm checkup. She heard us very patiently and made us comfortable and informed the reason of this issue. Also when I showed her yearly health checkup reports, then she went through it very patiently and noted down each and every important reading and made her analysis based on that. She was not in hurry to just prescribe us tests, rather she was very co-operative. I would definitely recommend her to other people.

tags: None
review:
I had visited Dr. Prathima P for my mother‚Äôs health issues last week. The way theDr. asked each minute details was commendable. She patiently suggested for the tests and upon checking the reports she made some good points about changing the lifestyle and prescribed minimal medications. Very much appreciated. I would definitely recommend her to my closed ones. 
Thank you

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: She is not just a doctor. She tries to connect to the human who is in discomfort, understand him/her, treat, and not just stops there. She would follow up to see if meds are responding or if symptoms are extending. No other GP in my mind cares about humanitarian aspects of life. It's important in today's world at least for doctors to be like saints, that's what COVID taught all of us pressingly. Cheers to her practice and I wish her lot of success and learning in her expertise.  God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Ms.Prathima is one  of the very a few doctors who has time for the patients and get into the grassroots level of the problem. She understands the heath condition and then start the treatment.

Ma‚Äôam‚Äôs attention to details is exemplary. In India very tough to find Doctor like her. I highly recommend her.

Thank you,
Bindu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** ****** ***** Cannot thank her enough. My wife had dengue and the doctor treated her like a mother. She called and texted to check on her everyday. Minimal medications and treatments. We overcame dengue successfully without even a tiny bit of issue. Doctor paid so much attention on every little thing and it was unbelievable for someone with such a busy schedule to keep a tab on every other patient. She does a tremendous job and I can go on and on about it.

tags: None
review: I am glad that I chose Dr. Prathima for my viral fever treatment. She is very professional and caring. She spends enough time to understand and check every possibility before prescribing. She also explains different reasons of the problem and make you feel better with the conversation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Extremely patient, great listener, does deep analysis. On top of that, she is always smiling, warm and carries friendly behaviour!! She also explains technical reasoning to a certain extent behind every medicine being prescribed. A perfect family doctor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am really satisfied with the doctors treatment. She is very friendly & patient. Did a thorough screening & clarified all my doubts. Recommend options & medicine exactly what was necessary. Did not give unnecessary medication or tests.
She shared her number in case there is any issue with finding the recommended medicines.
Excellent experience. There was hardly any wait time, which was a bonus.
Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Went there for the first time and was very very impressed with the doctor. She was so patient in listening to the problems. She was very friendly and understanding. Felt very comfortable explaining her all the health issues.
I would definitely recommend Dr. PRATHIMA CHILUKURI. She is AWESOME!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Prathima Chilukuri after my Home BP readings were high. Doctor very patiently made a note of my health & family history to access my problem and advised a few  medical tests to ensure overall wellbeing. She gave tips to adopt a healthy lifestyle by making changes to diet & exercise rather than just prescribing medicines. Thank you doctor for putting me on the path to recovery :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have visited Doctor Prathima twice. Once for my mother and once for myself. She is very patient and understands your queries and issues before providing any diagnosis. Her process of investigation is very thorough.She spends time enough time to ensure all your queries are answered. A very approachable person . I would definitely  recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Although her wait time is more. it is worth the visit.  She apologised for the long wait!! my first visit- she has taken 45 mins to understand every minute  detail of my health condition. Advised and recommended tests and medications. In short an excellent doctor with a human touch. A rarity! Thank you madam!

tags: Wait time,

review: You rarely find this kind of doctor in India. She spends lot of time with patient and ask questions to gather information and history. Her medication has helped me control my diabetes. I recommend her to everyone who is looking for good doctor with proper treatment

tags: None
review: Experience with Dr Pratima was awesome... She listens to the patient very patiently and explains treatment in  all possibilities ... lifestyle, food and medicine...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited the doctor a couple of weeks back as I had stomach ache and constant fever which she after a talk for 30 minutes called a "muscle pull" because of which the pain was treated with medicines that would cure the pull. A week later I visited another doctor and found out that well, the "pull" so identified is a ruptured appendix that should've been treated properly at the very first day. She spent more time knowing about my day to day routine than she should've to understand the cause of the pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
I really appreciate the doctor's old school way of getting to know the patient's entire health history , scribbling them down and using the deductive approach towards reaching any sort of conclusion or diagnosis for the matter. The doctor is patient throughput and thus you don't feel anxious to say everything in 2mins. This matters a lot.
However I have a word to put for the clinic management. They can really up their ways of how they treat people who come their, how they behave within themselves in front of patients and maintaining lower voices at least.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
very genuine and friendly pls consult her...
Dr. Prathima is v good doctor , she gave time to explain my health condition and she wrote everything on paper like my health issues , temp , bp, hr, etc... she is very friendly to receive our health issues and her medicine prescription was accurate for functioning of my body... 
She wrote what should i eat during the period of medication... how much i should be in rest... 
She wrote blood rest and asked me to watsapp and call about health conditions... she only cald me for 2days u know regarding how much sick or relief * ***** **** ********* ******  **** ******* im now happy to consult her any time if required...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have never seen such a wonderful doctor in my entire life. I took my wife as she is having frequent headaches and shoulder pain. Usually doctors tend to hurry up things while consulting, but She was very patient in listening to all her problems. She has spent more than half an hour to treat her. The way she explains things is very pleasing. She answers even the silliest questions you ask. My wife really wished she was her Gynaecologist who did the delivery. Her way of getting to know each and every problem from you is marvelous. She literally filled the entire page with just the observations from what she got from the conversation. She will not suggest more medicines as other doctors do. We are running short of adjectives to tell about our experience. Probably the best doctor we have ever seen.
